sentences.en: Caffeine use can lead to a condition called caffeine intoxication.
sentences.cn: 过多咖啡因摄入可能导致咖啡因中毒.

sentences.en: Chronic paraldehyde intoxication results in tolerance and dependence.
sentences.cn: 慢性副醛中毒能导致耐受性和依赖性.

sentences.en: He began to drink, drank himself to intoxication, till he slept obliterated.
sentences.cn: 他一直喝, 喝到他快要迷糊地睡着了.

sentences.en: In a kind of intoxication he would watch the pinkwhite buds of some backward beech tree.
sentences.cn: 在一种沉醉的状态中,他注视着晚开的山毛榉的淡红花蕾.

sentences.en: In the intoxication of life, you read the meaning of life.
sentences.cn: 在生活的陶醉中, 解读生命的意义.

sentences.en: Infants are particularly susceptible to vitamin D intoxication.
sentences.cn: 婴儿尤其容易引起维生素D中毒.

sentences.en: Intoxication interferes with memory and thinking, speech and coordination.
sentences.cn: 醉酒影响记忆、思考、语言与协调性。

sentences.en: Intoxication interferes with speech and coordination.
sentences.cn: 醉酒会影响言语能力和协调性。

sentences.en: Is that such a tragedy that people pay for their own intoxication?
sentences.cn: 大家自己花钱买开心有什么不行?

sentences.en: Loss of dexterity is generally accepted as visible indicators of alcohol - induced intoxication.
sentences.cn: 肢体灵活性的丧失通常被认为是酒精影响的醉酒指征.

sentences.en: Predator : Intoxication - Damage over time effect will now stack with other allies.
sentences.cn: Predator:Intoxication,持续性伤害的效果将会与队友相加.

sentences.en: Speaking increasingly louder is generally accepted as visible indicators of alcohol - induced intoxication.
sentences.cn: 说话声音越来越大通常可以被认为是受到了酒精影响的醉酒指征.

sentences.en: The young are permanently in a state of resembling intoxication.
sentences.cn: 年轻人永远处在一种陶醉的状态中。

sentences.en: This is a very rare case of acute and lethal cyanide intoxication.
sentences.cn: 这是一极为罕见致死性氰化物中毒的急症.

sentences.en: When Della reached home her intoxication gave way a little to prudence and reason.
sentences.cn: 德拉回家之后,她的狂喜有点儿变得审慎和理智了.

words.tran_cn: 醉人的；令人陶醉的；使兴奋的
使陶醉；醉酒；使中毒（intoxicate的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: Intoxication is the state of being drunk
